lead_paragraph: Two of the three inmates who escaped Friday from a maximum security jail in Orange County are believed to be members of Vietnamese gangs, and could be embedded within the county’s sizable Vietnamese community.

headline.print_headline: California: Help Sought to Find Escapees
headline.main: California: Help Sought to Find Escapees

snippet: Two of the three inmates who escaped Friday from a maximum security jail in Orange County are believed to be members of Vietnamese gangs, and could be embedded within the county’s sizable Vietnamese community.
abstract: California officials suggest inmates Jonathan Tieu and Bac Duong, who escaped from maximum-security jail in Orange County with third inmate Hossein Nayeri, are likely members of Vietnamese gangs; efforts to re-capture men continue.
